16/12/2024
Ethics: please make sure to have ethics approval before the start of the data collection, please add the PRET number in your DMP upon approval, update other sections as needed, and submit as intermediate DMP. 
Documentation/Metadata: your answer here is not very clear, what is the metadata file that you will create, is this a readme file or part of the codebook you mention earlier? For more information about documentation and metadata see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: only share your data openly on OSF if you are sure that it is fully anonymous, if there is still a (small) possibility that the participants could be reidentified please use RDR and apply access restrictions so interested researchers will have to submit a request to access the files. You can use the integration dashboard to upload your OSF data to RDR see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
label: intermediate DMP needed
